mapper.select: /*common.getGatherMemberForScheduler*/ SELECT A.MOIM_IDXX , A.USER_NUMB , CASE WHEN A.USER_NUMB = B.USER_NUMB THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS MAST_YSNO FROM TB_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TM_GATHER B ON A.MOIM_IDXX = B.GATH_IDXX WHERE A.MOIM_IDXX = #{MOIM_IDXX} AND A.BANN_YSNO = 'N' AND A.WAIT_YSNO = 'N'
SELECT /*gather.getEnddedGahter*/ GATH_IDXX FROM TM_GATHER WHERE TO_DATE(CONCAT(CONCAT(MOIM_DATE, ' '), MOIM_TIME), 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= SYSDATE AND ENDD_YSNO = 'N'

SELECT /*gather.getOneDayLeft*/ A.GATH_IDXX FROM TM_GATHER A LEFT JOIN TB_NOTIFY B ON B.BOAD_IDXX = A.GATH_IDXX AND B.NOTI_CODE = 'C01' WHERE TO_DATE(CONCAT(CONCAT(MOIM_DATE, ' '), MOIM_TIME), 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') - SYSDATE <= 1 AND TO_DATE(CONCAT(CONCAT(MOIM_DATE, ' '), MOIM_TIME), 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI') - SYSDATE > 0 AND ENDD_YSNO = 'N' AND B.BOAD_IDXX IS NULL
